import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Slide } from 'react-slideshow-image' const slideImages = [ 'images/slide_2.jpg', 'images/slide_3.jpg', 'images/slide_4.jpg' ]; const properties = { duration: 5000, transitionDuration: 500, infinite: true, indicators: true, arrows: true, pauseOnHover: true, onChange: (oldIndex, newIndex) => { console.log(`slide transition from ${oldIndex} to ${newIndex}`); } } const Slideshow = () => { return (
Slide 1
Slide 2
Slide 3
) } export default Artwork
